Don't be triggered so fast now, guys. 1) They are in a classroom with so many students (unless it's one of those dumbshit stories, it's very unlikely any of that sort of shit is happening here). 2) It's too early for NTR, cmon you've seen Ryoh-zoh's previous works, they don't creep in until WAY after. 3) Check out the meaning of the title; it allures to MC having a painful rel with Amuro (cuz of jealousy, possessiveness, anger) mixed in with sweet feelings. It is entirely possible (don't rule this out yet as anything else can occur) that this series will not have NTR at all, though chances are super slim based on the collected facts. PS: WTF is "sumapologize" on page 11? LoL

That being said, the last page looked like it couldn’t be anything other than a BJ unless it’s just the author wanting to throw the position out there to make it REALLY look like NTR

Yeah this is exactly what NTR should be, absolutely disgusting and uwankable. Reminds me why I should keep my toes against the NTR genre. In a writer's perspective: 10/10 you did your thing, and not in just the sex scene parts, and on the other end, *Fuck you.*
